title: Elsinore Street Apartments- 2bed 1bath w/ht & hw
posting_body: ['First floor corner apartment in Concord Center with just a short walk to the commuter rail, shopping, restaurants and the library.', 'The eat-in kitchen offers abundant cabinet space, an apartment sized refrigerator and a gas cooking stove.', 'The living room has a beautiful picture window overlooking the Concord River.', 'Two bedrooms, one fits up to a queen-sized bedroom set.', 'Coin-operated washer dryers are provided for the residents in the building along with your own private storage locker.', 'Assigned parking.', 'Gas heat, hot water, sewer, trash/snow removal and landscaping included in the rent.', 'Superb commuter location, minutes to Routes 2, 128, 117.', 'Easy walk to charming Concord shops, eateries and commuter rail to Boston.', 'Located in picturesque and historic Concord.', 'Nearby towns: Lexington, Acton, Bedford, Lincoln, Sudbury, Wayland, Waltham, Westford.', 'Lease terms:', '$2,000 per month for a minimum of a 15-month lease.', '$2,200 per month for a minimum of a 12-month lease.', '$2,400 per month for a minimum of a 9-month lease.', 'No pets.', 'No smoking.', 'Qualification Standards:', 'Good credit & clean criminal background.', 'Minimum net income: $68,572 per year on a 15-month lease (not applicable for section 8 applicants).', 'Good references.', 'This apartment is presently occupied.', 'Therefore, we are not showing it at this time.', 'All interested parties must email their full name, names of all other occupants, and phone number for more information on the first available day of showing.', '*Pictures and floor plan are of a sample unit and should be used as an example only*']
